projects.name: SchoolUp
projects.description:
Another colaborative project. This is a school management app that I made with Java SE and JavaFX. It's a desktop app that allows you to manage students, classes, courses, etc...
I worked on the backend and my two associates worked on the frontend and files managements

projects.name: flutter-law-gpt
projects.description: This is a mobile app that uses OpenAi API to implement chat functionality with different models that we can choose.

projects.name: Lawmine shop
projects.description:
An App with laravel to manage products (yeah basically it's like a todolist but with products).
This is a collaborative project, I worked on the backend with laravel and my friend worked on the frontend with Tailwind.

projects.name: Plant App
projects.description:
This is an app of presentation of some plant in order to buy them. There is no back so actually you can't really buy anything haha.
That for me a good way to learn Flutter basics.

projects.name: Booking Law
projects.description:
This is a flight booking app with admin, users & companies interfaces made with PHP.
Really cool.

projects.name: Vue task tracker
projects.description: This is a basic task tracker made with VueJS and tailwind. Json server was used for the "back-end".

projects.name: Angular todo-list
projects.description:
This is a todo-list app made with Angular & Bootstrap. It's a simple app that allows you once you are logged in to add, delete, update and mark as done your tasks.
I used JSON server to simulate a backend.
